metadata.videoTitle: How to Improve Oral Health & Its Critical Role in Brain & Body Health

title: Oral Health
content: Good oral health is more than just having a bright smile and fresh breath. It encompasses the entire oral cavity, including the oral microbiome, pallet, and tonsils. Emerging research reveals that oral health is a crucial element of overall bodily health, impacting everything from cardiovascular health to disease prevention. In fact, oral health is now recognized as the seventh pillar of overall health, alongside mental health and physical performance. This connection underscores the importance of maintaining proper oral hygiene and seeking ways to improve and restore oral health.
